ForceFips.description: Force uSync to use FIPS compliant hashing algorthims when comparing files

AutoTemplates.description: Settings for the AutoTemplates package, (dynamic adding of templates based on files on disk)

RootFolder.description: Location where all uSync files are saved by default

DefaultSet.description: The default handler set to use on all notification triggered events

ImportAtStartup.description: Import when Umbraco boots (can be group name or 'All' so everything is done, blank or 'none' == off)

ExportOnSave.description: Export when an item is saved in Umbraco

UiEnabledGroups.description: The handler groups that are enabled in the UI.

ReportDebug.description: Debug reports (creates an export into a temp folder for comparison)

AddOnPing.description: Ping the AddOnUrl to get the json used to show the addons dashboard

RebuildCacheOnCompletion.description: Pre Umbraco 8.4 - rebuild the cache was needed after content was imported

FailOnMissingParent.description: Fail if the items parent is not in umbraco or part of the batch being imported

CacheFolderKeys.description: Should folder keys be cached (for speed)

ShowVersionCheckWarning.description: Show a version check warning to the user if the folder version is less than the version expected by uSync.

CustomMappings.description: Custom mapping keys, allows users to add a simple config mapping to make one property type to behave like an existing one

EnableHistory.description: Should the history view be on of off ?

DefaultExtension.description: Default file extension for the uSync files.

ImportOnFirstBoot.description: Import the uSync folder on the first boot.

FirstBootGroup.description: Handler group(s) to run on first boot, default is All (so full import)

DisableDashboard.description: Disable the default dashboard (so people can't accedently press the buttons).

SummaryDashboard.description: summerize results (for when there are loads and loads of items)

SummaryLimit.description: limit of items to display before flicking to summary view. (this is per handler)

HideAddOns.description: list of addon (tabs) you don't want to show inside uSync dashboard.

USyncBackOfficeConfigurationuSyncHandler.description: Settings for a handler set (group of handlers)

HandlerGroups.description: List of groups handlers can belong to.

IsSelectable.description: for handlers to appear in the drop down on the dashboard they have to be selectable

USyncBackOfficeConfigurationHandlerSetti.description: Settings to control who a handler works

Actions.description: List of actions the handler is configured for.

UseFlatStructure.description: Should use a flat folder structure when exporting items

GuidNames.description: Items should be saved with their guid/key value as the filename

FailOnMissingParent.description: Imports should fail if the parent item is missing (if false, item be importated go a close as possible to location)

Group.description: Override the group the handler belongs too.

Delete.description: Delete templates from Umbraco if the file is missing from disk

Delay.description: Amount of time (milliseconds) to wait after file change event before applying changes
